content:
Starting implementation of KinOS thought system integration. Initial approach:

1. Add thought storage to existing database
2. Implement read-only access controls
3. Create namespace isolation per swarm
4. Add real-time web display components

Key considerations:
• Data isolation between swarms
• Efficient querying for web display
• Real-time updates
• Scalable storage design

Next step: Database schema implementation with proper access controls.
